name: Box-Fu! Beta for phones
description:
Box-fu! by UDGames is a game in which you play as a box who has to kick his way through the lane till he reaches the end. It's very simple, by fun!

Here's the version for PCs:

Box-Fu! Beta (PC) by UDGames (itch.io)

If you notice any bugs, please inform them to me by commenting.

By the way, WebGL versions (Versions that can play in the browser) will be outdated from the now on.
